data.text: Bel bɔ ne mu ase, Nebo kuntun ne mu;
Wɔbɔ mu kuntun, bɔ wɔn mu ase;
Mpo kɔsi mo nkɔkoraa berɛ ne ɛberɛ a mobɛfu dwono mu,
“Hwan ho na mode me bɛto, anaa mobɛbu no me sɛso?
Ebinom hwie sikakɔkɔɔ firi wɔn mmɔtɔ mu
Wɔsoa no wɔ wɔn mmatire so,
“Monkae no yie, momma ɛnka mo tirim,
Monkae nneɛma a atwam no, teteete nneɛma no;
Mɛfrɛ anomaa a ɔkyere mmoa afiri apueeɛ fam;
Montie me, mo a moyɛ akokoɔdurufoɔ,
